title: FS: T206 HOFers - 2/11 Large Price Reduction On Last Card!
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOFers - 2/11 Large Price Reduction On Last Card!
posts.post_content:
I have a small batch of T206 HOFers to sell in a couple of postings. All of them are raw. If you are not happy with a card for any reason, please return it for a full refund. (I've sold two large T206 collections, over 250 cards, and have had zero returned)

I plan to price them reasonably and reduce the price if they do not sell quickly. All will be posted in this same thread, so please check back to look for new listings if you are interested. 

All prices are net to me, with PayPal preferred. I will cover the shipping on all orders.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or ask questions.

Once again I will start with the best...Ty Cobb!

=========

Cobb red portrait - SOLD  Some kid probably folded it over years ago, leaving the crease right through the middle that you see.

Bresnahan portrait - SOLD

Wallace portrait - SOLD Great looking front, but some paper loss on the back.

New cards added 2/5/20:

Johnson - SOLD

Clarke - SOLD

Beckley - SOLD

Reductions on the last 3 cards from this small collection:

Johnson - SOLD

Clarke - SOLD

Beckley - SOLD
Further discounts on Clarke and Beckley above.
